USER_NOT_FOUND: Could not found your account. please try again.
INVALID_FIRSTNAME: First name should be at least 3 character and maximum of 50 character.
INVALID_LASTNAME: Last name should be at least 3 character and maximum of 50 character.
INVALID_COMFIRM_TOKEN: Invalid token to confirm your email.
INVALID_RESET_PASSWORD_TOKEN: Invalid token to reset your password.
EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Your email address is not verified.
RESET_EMAIL_SUCCESS: We have sent reset password link to your email address. please follow the instruction.
PASSWORD_NOT_MATCH: Password and confirm password do not match.
RESET_SUCCESS: Your password has been successfully reset.
INVALID_RESET_TOKEN: You have provided wrong reset password token.
INVALID_VIDEO_FILE_FORMAT: Not a valid video file. please try again.
FILE_TOO_LARGE: Video file size is too large. Only 30 seconds video is allowed.
INVALID_IBAN_NO: Please provide valid iBan account number.
USER_MUST_FIELD_OR_SUPPORT: User must be field or support engineer
USER_STATUS_MUST_BUZY_OR_IDLE: User status must be Busy or Idle
